comment.author: 11012736@N06
comment._content:
I really appreciate sharing this photographs with the community, but is there a way to know more about the photograph itself? All images have the reference of Thomas Smillie, the photographer, but none references the actual content of the picture (where it has been taken?). 
I realize that this happens because there are no further information about the location, but anyway, I would like to know.
Cheers from Buenos Aires!
Rosamunda

comment.author: 57668330@N00
comment._content: Seconding rosamunda_ar's comment - I'd love to know whether the house shown here actually is Belmont.
